    • About Misty SOLDwisch


    In real estate since 1999, and a broker/owner since 2007, Misty Soldwisch has been leading the Central Iowa real estate market with innovative approaches to marketing, systems, and coaching while building a top producing team with a “specialist” approach.  Misty launched the Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate brand in Iowa in 2017 and is CEO of the company.

    Misty SOLDwisch
    Be Better DSM - Real Estate Coaching
    Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Innovations

    About Aaron Moulton

    Aaron Moulton
    Be Better DSM - Real Estate Coaching
    Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Innovations
    9325 Bishop Drive #110
    West Des Moines, IA 50365
    515-218-7740
    AaronM@BHGInnovations.com
    BHGInnovations.com

    Aaron grew up in real estate, and has been around the real estate business for nearly 16 years now, with positions in both mortgage banking and residential real estate companies. Aaron is a sales training guru with an emphasis on understanding how finance knowledge can help our agents help our clients. Aaron joined Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate Innovations as Director of Business Development, and his job is to find and develop talent!
